'''1.20.4''' is a minor hotfix update to {{JE}}, released on December 7, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-20-4|Minecraft Java Edition 1.20.4|December 7, 2023}}</ref> which fixes a critical bug. It is compatible with [[Java Edition 1.20.3|1.20.3]] servers.

This is the last release of ''Java Edition'' to run on 32-bit operating systems and Java from 17 to 20.<ref>{{snap|24w14a|April 3, 2024}}</ref>

This is the final version released in 2023.
